name: Kristen Anderson-Lopez
info:
• 别名: Kristen J. Anderson

detail: Kristen Anderson-Lopez was born on March 21, 1972 in New York City, New York, USA as Kristen J. Anderson. She has been married to Robert Lopez since October 12, 2003. They have two children.
